footer.aboutUs:
Why should it be complicated and time-consuming to find
public funding for innovative ventures? It shouldn’t! Avonniv
is a non-profit platform that makes it easy to discover
opportunities of public funding for driving innovation.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.content:
Can you think of any other grantmaker, or any information,
that should be available on Avonniv? If so, drop us a line and
we´ll get on it asap! Email:
